src_original: cittapūrvaṅgamāś ca sarvadharmāḥ /  citte parijñāte sarvadharmāḥ parijñātā bhavanti /
api tu  cittena nīyate lokaḥ cittaṃ cittaṃ na paśyati /
cittena cīyate karma śubhaṃ vā yadi vâśubham //
cittaṃ bhramate 'lātavat /  cittaṃ bhramate turaṅgavat /  cittaṃ dahate devâgnivat /  [ Bendall ed p122 ---> ]
